DESCRIPTION: Energy spent on [#fe513a]Primal[] cards applies #yScorch to random enemies.
Scorched creatures take damage equal to their scorch and lose #b1 scorch when #yAttacked
#ySealed effects activate whenever you discard a #yStatus or [#fe513a]Primal[] card.
Discard a card and draw a new card to replace it.
Energy spent on [#94bdff]Holy[] cards is accumulated to produce [#94bdff]Holy[] [#94bdff]Power[] which increases the damage and block gain of [#94bdff]Holy[] cards for the rest of combat.
When a creature obtains #b8 Penance, it loses #b20 HP and HP loss from this effect is increased by #b10 this combat
Increases damage and #yBlock gain of [#94bdff]Holy[] cards.
Spend X [#94bdff]Holy[] [#94bdff]Power[] for an effect
Perform the following effect every X damage taken or HP lost. NL At the end of your turn, if you took no damage or HP loss this turn take X damage and remove this effect.
Discard X cards, Gain the following effect if you Discard a [#94bdff]Holy[] card. NL [#fe513a]Primal[], #yStatus and #yCurse cards discarded become Divine Embers
[theDragonkin:LightIcon] #yBlock is Used before other block types and is not lost at the start of your turn.
[theDragonkin:FireIcon] blocks and reflects equal damage. [theDragonkin:FireIcon] falls to the total scorch among enemies at the start of turn.
When you obtain #b5 Sacrifice spend it and gain #b1 [#94bdff]Holy[] [#94bdff]Power[].
This relic only appears for slayers of Draconic Ancestry.
#yField cards attach to the target when played. NL If this field had #ytime #ycounters it detaches when it has none and recovers all time counters.
This #yField loses a Time counter each time it #yTicks.
Trigger an effect if attached to a creature. NL Ticks automatically at the start of your turn.
Stagger is gained whenever you take unblocked damage and is used to determine how much damage you can prevent in the past. NL Stagger is reduced each turn.
Spend [theDragonkin:TemporalIcon] #yStagger for an effect, You will be Healed for the amount of #yStagger spent.
Take the following resources from your next turn. NL Borrowed resources not accounted for by the end of next turn will be payed for in #yStagger.
#yRewinding a card puts it on the top of your draw pile, and draws you a card next turn.
The next time an enemy breaks your block, retaliate with the following effect.
#yPanicking creatures deal up to #b50% less damage and will additionally hit random a enemy when attacking. NL #yPanic is reduced each turn increased by the number of extra attacks made.
When #yScried, add this to your hand and trigger the following effect.
Has a Bonus effect from being #yScried. NL When #yScried, add this to your hand.
Reveal the top card of your draw pile, if it matches the listed card type draw it and do the following effect otherwise discard it.
This #yField gains a Time counter each time it #yTicks and performs an effect based on the number of Time counters it has, #yDetaching after the last effect is used.
#ySight reveals cards from the top of your deck at all times.
The effect that follows targets the X closest left adjacent cards. wrapping to the right side of the hand as needed.
Sharpen applied to cards increases the damage they deal this combat.
Shine applied to cards increases the Block they apply this combat.
#yChilled creatures give #yBlock equal to their chill and lose #b1 chill when they take unblocked attack damage or are damaged by an #yIcicle
#yOrb : Deals damage to the last enemy you attacked. After being #yEvoked, if your next orb is an #yIcicle #yEvoke it.
#yOrb : Applies #Chill to random enemies each turn. When #Evoked applies #yChill to ALL enemies.
When an Orb is #yEvoked from a crystal orb slot, gain #b1 Temporary Focus and lose that orb slot.
A Bonus effect if the last card played matches the listed type.
The following effect only activates the first time each combat a card with this name is played.
When blocking Attack damage, deals damage back and lose #yIce #ySpikes equal to the damage blocked. Lose half as much against #yChilled attackers.
